options.content: Cross-Practice Domain

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  avg(lead_time) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
  and issue_created_at is not null
  -- and issue_status = '已完成'
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
group by 1;

select 
  now() as time,
  '<=' as value,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group (order by lead_time asc)
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
  and issue_resolved_at is not null
  -- and issue_status = '已完成'
  and lead_time is not null
  -- to be modified
  and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
group by 1;

select 
  now() as time,
  format('%3sd', lead_time) as metric,
  percent_rank() over(order by lead_time asc) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
  and issue_resolved_at is not null
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
order by lead_time asc

with _requirement as(
  select 
    ji.id,
    ji.issue_resolved_at,
    lead_time
  from jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
    and issue_resolved_at is not null
    and lead_time is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select 
  case 
    when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_resolved_at,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
    when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_resolved_at,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
    end as time,
  avg(lead_time) as average_lead_time,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group (order by lead_time asc) as percentile_80_lead_time
from _requirement
group by 1
order by 1 asc

with _requirement as(
  select
    ji.id,
    ji.epic_key,
    ji.lead_time
  from
    jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
    -- join jira_boards jb on jbi.board_id = jb.id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
    and issue_resolved_at is not null
    and epic_key is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select 
  now() as time,
  epic_key as metric,
  avg(lead_time) as value
from _requirement
group by 1,2
order by avg(lead_time) desc
limit 10

panels.title: 2.6 - Average Requirement Lead Time (Breakdown by Epic)

options.content: Requirement

panels.description: The total number of requirements created.

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  count(*) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  -- join jira_boards jb on jbi.board_id = jb.id
where 
  issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
  and issue_created_at is not null 
  and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
group by 1;

panels.title: 1.1 - Requirement Count (Total)

targets.rawSql:
with _requirement as(
  select
    ji.id,
    ji.issue_created_at
  from
    jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
    -- join jira_boards jb on jbi.board_id = jb.id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
    and issue_created_at is not null 
    and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select
  case 
    when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_created_at,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
    when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_created_at,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
    end as time,
  count(distinct id) as requirement_count
from _requirement
group by 1
order by 1 asc

with _requirement as(
  select
    ji.id,
    ji.epic_key
  from
    jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
    -- join jira_boards jb on jbi.board_id = jb.id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
    and issue_created_at is not null
    and epic_key is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select 
  now() as time,
  epic_key as metric,
  count(*) as value
from _requirement
group by 1,2
order by 3 desc

select
  now() as time,
  count(case when ji.issue_resolved_at is not null then 1 else null end) as delivered_count
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
  and issue_created_at is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)

with _requirement as(
  select
    count(distinct ji.id) as total_count,
    count(case when ji.issue_resolved_at is not null then 1 else null end) as delivered_count
  from jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
    and issue_created_at is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)


select 
  now() as time,
  1.0 * delivered_count/total_count as requirement_delivery_rate
from _requirement

with _requirement as(
  select
    case 
      when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_created_at,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
      when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_created_at,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
      end as time,
    count(distinct ji.id) as total_count,
    count(case when ji.issue_resolved_at is not null then 1 else null end) as delivered_count
  from jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
    and issue_created_at is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
  group by 1
)


select 
  time,
  1.0 * delivered_count/total_count as requirement_delivery_rate
from _requirement
order by 1

with _requirement as(
  select
    ji.epic_key as metric,
    count(distinct ji.id) as total_count,
    count(case when ji.issue_resolved_at is not null then 1 else null end) as delivered_count
  from jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Story','Task') 
    and issue_created_at is not null
    and epic_key is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
  group by 1
)


select 
  now() as time,
  metric,
  1.0 * delivered_count/total_count as requirement_delivery_rate
from _requirement
order by 2 desc
limit 10

options.content: Development

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  avg(EXTRACT(epoch from age(merged_at, first_comment_time)) / 86400) as value
from gitlab_merge_requests
WHERE
  first_comment_time is not null
  and merged_at is not null
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
  and project_id in ($repo)

with reviewed_mr as(
select 
  gitlab_created_at,
  EXTRACT(epoch from age(merged_at, first_comment_time)) / 86400 as review_time
from gitlab_merge_requests
WHERE
  first_comment_time is not null
  and merged_at is not null
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
  and project_id in ($repo)
)

select 
  case 
    when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(gitlab_created_at,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
    when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(gitlab_created_at,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
    end as time,
  avg(review_time) as average_review_time,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group (order by review_time asc) as percentile_80_review_time
from reviewed_mr
group by 1
order by 1 asc

panels.title: 13.2 Merge Request Review Time (Breakdown by Time)

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group 
    (order by (EXTRACT(epoch from age(merged_at, first_comment_time)) / 86400) asc) 
    as percentile_80_review_time
from gitlab_merge_requests
WHERE
  first_comment_time is not null
  and merged_at is not null
  and $__timeFilter(gitlab_created_at)
  and project_id in ($repo)

SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  count(*) as value
FROM gitlab_commits
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and project_id in ($repo)
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

-- with _commits as(
  SELECT
    case 
        when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(authored_date,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
        when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(authored_date,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
        end as time,
    count(*) as value
  FROM gitlab_commits
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(authored_date)
    and project_id in ($repo)
  group by 1
  order by 1
-- )

SELECT
  now() as time,
  gp.name as repo_name,
  count(*) as value
FROM gitlab_commits gc 
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gc.project_id in ($repo)
group by 1,2
order by 1

SELECT
  now() as time,
  gc.author_name,
  count(*) as value
FROM gitlab_commits gc 
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gc.project_id in ($repo)
group by 1,2
order by 3 desc

SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  sum(additions) as value
FROM gitlab_commits gc
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.id 
WHERE
  message not like '%Merge branch%'
  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gp.id in ($repo)
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  sum(deletions) as value
FROM gitlab_commits gc
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.id 
WHERE
  message not like '%Merge branch%'
  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gp.id in ($repo)
group by 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  case 
      when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(authored_date,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
      when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(authored_date,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
      end as time,
  sum(additions) as Added_LOC,
  sum(deletions) as Deleted_LOC
FROM gitlab_commits
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and project_id in ($repo)
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: 16.2 Added and Deleted LOC (Breakdown by Time)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  now() as time,
  gc.author_name,
  sum(additions) as added_loc,
  sum(deletions) as removed_loc
FROM gitlab_commits gc 
  join gitlab_projects gp on gc.project_id = gp.id
WHERE
  author_name is not null
  and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  and gc.project_id in ($repo)
group by 1,2
order by 3 desc

options.content: Test

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  avg(lead_time) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Bug') 
  and issue_created_at is not null
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
group by 1;

select 
  now() as time,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group (order by lead_time asc) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Bug') 
  and issue_resolved_at is not null
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
group by 1;

select 
  now() as time,
  format('%3sd', lead_time) as metric,
  percent_rank() over(order by lead_time asc) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Bug') 
  and issue_resolved_at is not null
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
order by lead_time asc

with _bugs as(
  select 
    ji.id,
    ji.issue_resolved_at,
    lead_time
  from jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Bug') 
    and issue_resolved_at is not null
    and lead_time is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select 
  case 
    when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_resolved_at,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
    when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_resolved_at,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
    end as time,
  avg(lead_time) as average_bug_age,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group (order by lead_time asc) as percentile_80_bug_age
from _bugs
group by 1
order by 1 asc

with _bugs as(
  select
    ji.id,
    ji.epic_key,
    ji.lead_time
  from
    jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
    -- join jira_boards jb on jbi.board_id = jb.id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Bug') 
    and issue_resolved_at is not null
    and epic_key is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select 
  now() as time,
  epic_key as metric,
  avg(lead_time) as value
from _bugs
group by 1,2
order by avg(lead_time) desc
limit 10

options.content: Operation

targets.rawSql:
select 
  now() as time,
  avg(lead_time) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Incident') 
  and issue_created_at is not null
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_created_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
group by 1;

select 
  now() as time,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group (order by lead_time asc) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Incident') 
  and issue_resolved_at is not null
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
group by 1;

select 
  now() as time,
  format('%3sd', lead_time) as metric,
  percent_rank() over(order by lead_time asc) as value
from jira_issues ji
  join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
where 
  issue_type in ('Incident') 
  and issue_resolved_at is not null
  and lead_time is not null
  and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
  and jbi.board_id in ($board)
order by lead_time asc

with _incidents as(
  select 
    ji.id,
    ji.issue_resolved_at,
    lead_time
  from jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Incident') 
    and issue_resolved_at is not null
    and lead_time is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select 
  case 
    when '$interval' = 'week' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_resolved_at,'YYYY-WW'),'YYYY-WW')
    when '$interval' = 'month' then to_timestamp(to_char(issue_resolved_at,'YYYY-MM'),'YYYY-MM')
    end as time,
  avg(lead_time) as average_incident_age,
  percentile_disc(0.8) within group (order by lead_time asc) as percentile_80_incident_age
from _incidents
group by 1
order by 1 asc

with _incidents as(
  select
    ji.id,
    ji.epic_key,
    ji.lead_time
  from
    jira_issues ji
    join jira_board_issues jbi on ji.id = jbi.issue_id
  where 
    issue_type in ('Incident') 
    and issue_resolved_at is not null
    and epic_key is not null
    and $__timeFilter(issue_resolved_at)
    and jbi.board_id in ($board)
)

select 
  now() as time,
  epic_key as metric,
  avg(lead_time) as value
from _incidents
group by 1,2
order by avg(lead_time) desc
limit 20
